Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! If you haven't heard about it, there's a guy over on Reddit threatening to kill Kerbals for every day 0.90 is not released.

While I wholeheartedly approve of this, the forums need to come up with something in return!

What should we do!?

Hehe. I know that guy, he posts a lot of good stuff on ze reddit.

What should we do?

JOIN HIM
Rescue a kerbal for every day that it isn't released

We aren't allowed such things here. Anything relating to .90 is relegated to the "hype" thread. This thread will not live long.

Of course a change in the enforcement of that rule, the allowance of such threads, might be a sign.
we will get a mudkip to attack him once for every day that 0.90 is released!

We aren't allowed such things here. Anything relating to .90 is relegated to the "hype" thread. This thread will not live long.

Of course a change in the enforcement of that rule, the allowance of such threads, might be a sign.

This is kinda stupid, and killing kerbals can be expected of the Redditors, they need to learn to fly better

We can just wait. Unless Squad releases by Thursday morning at the very latest, he'll have to simultaneously kill so many Kerbals that his computer will probably die first trying to process it all.

... I mean, how many parts would a vessel have to have to carry more than 500 Kerbals?

... What should we do!?

How about ... What's Reddit?

... What should we do!?

Be pro and don't kill kerbals?
